item.title: Charts_01
item.description:
#Charts
#Charts
Default
type: bar labels: [sh001, sh002, sh003, sh004, sh005, sh006, sh007, sh008, sh009] series: - title: Tasks Count data: [1,3,3,1,5,8,7,1,2] - title: Complexity(1-3) data: [2,2,3,2,3,3,2,3,3] Copy

Default
type: line labels: [Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday] series: - title: Title 1 data: [1,2,3,4,5] - title: Title 2 data: [5,4,3,2,1] - title: Title 3 data: [8,2,5,-1,4] Copy

Default
type: line labels: [Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday] tension: 0.5 series: - title: Title 1 data: [1,2,3,4,5] - title: Title 2 data: [5,4,3,2,1] - title: Title 3 data: [8,2,5,-1,4] Copy

Default
type: pie labels: [Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday] series: - title: Title 1 data: [1,2,3,4,5] - title: Title 2 data: [5,4,3,2,1] width: 70% labelColors: true Copy

Default
type: doughnut labels: [Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday] series: - title: Title 1 data: [1,2,3,4,5] - title: Title 2 data: [5,4,3,2,1] width: 70% labelColors: true Copy

Default
type: polarArea labels: [Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday] series: - title: Title 1 data: [1,2,3,4,5] - title: Title 2 data: [5,4,3,2,1] labelColors: true width: 70% Copy

Default
type: radar labels: [Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday] series: - title: Title 1 data: [1,2,3,4,5] - title: Title 2 data: [5,4,3,2,1] width: 70% Copy
